text: Donald Edwin "Don" Young (June 9, 1933 - March 18, 2022) was an American politician. He was a member of the Republican Party. He was the U.S. Representative for from 1973 until 2022. Young became Dean of the United States House of Representatives on December 5, 2017 after the resignation of John Conyers of Michigan. Young died while on flight near Seattleâ€“Tacoma International Airport in SeaTac, Washington on March 18, 2022, aged 88, while traveling from Los Angeles to Alaska. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Don Young official U.S. House site * Don Young for Congress * * * * , House Natural Resources Committee, Nov 18, 2011 Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Episcopalians Category:Deans of the United States House of Representatives Category:United States representatives from Alaska Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:20th- century American politicians Category:21st-century American politicians Category:Politicians from California Category:Educators from California Category:Educators from Alaska
title: Don Young
